item.description: More than 180 million people are on alert for a brutal weekend storm.

item.title: WATCH: 'Kitty Fat Camp' helps overweight cats find homes
item.description: ABC News' Danny New talks to one woman who is helping overweight felines shed pounds and live healthier lives.

item.title: WATCH: How to stay safe during extreme cold
item.description: Frostbite can set in on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. Early signs include numbness or tingling.
